book.synopsis: When the practical jokes go too far causing Bruno and Boots to be falsely blamed, the boys know they have to put an end to the madness and catch the mystery person behind the irritating pranks. Reprint.
book.title_long: Something Fishy At Macdonald Hall (Bruno and Boots)
book.dimensions: Height: 7.5 Inches, Length: 5.25 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
